availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Martha Ray on October 14, 1830. Owned 12 enslaved person in 1850.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington, District 1, p. 102. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Washington, not stated, p. unknown; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000191852, Mercer County Marriages, p. 1. Find A Grave, “Dr Granville C Alfred (unknown-May 27, 1873),” Mem #69894033, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=Alfred&GSfn=Granville&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=69894033&df=all& (accessed June 4, 2017).
